New Records: Shadab Khan became the Player of the Match with his all-round performance
Key Match Events: Pakistan defeated South Africa by 33 runs
Shadab Khan scored 52 runs off 22 balls
Iftikhar Ahmed scored 51 runs off 35 balls
Anrich Nortje took 4 wickets for 41 runs
Shaheen Shah Afridi took 3 wickets for 14 runs
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan won the toss and decided to bat first
Temba Bavuma said South Africa would have batted first as well
Babar Azam said Pakistan will try to put runs on the board and then put pressure on South Africa
Post-Match Reflections: Shadab Khan said he has done this in PSL as well, and this is the best international game
Babar Azam said cricket is a funny game and anything can happen
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was delayed due to rain
The DLS method was used to calculate the target for South Africa
South Africa's total score was 152 runs
